feature.name: clustering
feature.description: Allows users to access the clustering functionality

feature.name: content_pack_superfeedr
feature.description: Allows users to access content generated by Superfeedr

feature.name: content_pack_acquiremedia_not_licensed
feature.description: Allows user to access NOT licensed content generated by Acquire Media (Naviga)

feature.name: content_pack_twingly_news
feature.description: Allows user to access news generated by Twingly

feature.name: lucene_query_search
feature.description: enables lucene search syntax `lucene_query` parameter in api-news

feature.name: advanced_entities_search
feature.description: Allows users to access Entity Level Sentiment Analysis

feature.name: advanced_entities_search_include_elsa
feature.description: Determines that ELSA should be included on response or not.

feature.name: prominence_score_search
feature.description: enables prominence score in AQL query and in search response of the api-news /stories endpoint

feature.name: relevance_boosting
feature.description: Improves sorting of article search results by boosting relevance of articles.

feature.name: new_v3_entities
feature.description: enables new format of V3 entities

feature.name: tagger_industries
feature.description: returns industries generated by AM Tagger

feature.name: tagger_categories
feature.description: returns categories generated by AM Tagger

feature.name: external-entity-mapping-duns
feature.description: Enables to access mapping entity ids by duns number
